transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Hi Naresh sir, very good afternoon. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya madam.
Executive: Sir, main Preeti baat kar rahi thi senior manager IndiaMART ki.
Customer: Kaun bol rahe ho madam?
Executive: Sir, main IndiaMART se senior manager baat kar rahi thi Preeti ki. Actually aapka ek catalog hai na, Uparist Steel Industries karke IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: So actually abhi aapka discussion hua tha Preeti ke saath services se related. To aapne after discussion yaha pe not satisfied mark kiya hua hai. To main jaan sakti hu ki ye kis regarding aapne ye feedback not satisfied diya hua hai?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Madam ye koi dekho pata kya hai ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ek to na koi bhi aaj video call kari inhone mere ko kuch dikha rahe the ji.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Customer: Mere ko video call pe kya cheez dikha rahe the wo, main to inki koi baat samjha nahi. Kis liye to inhone video call kari. Telephone conversation mein inhone kya dikkat aa gayi unko. Video call pe kya dikkat aayi. Matlab mere ko to kuch samajh mein aaya wo mere ko data share kar rahe the.
Customer: Us date ka mere ko kya matlab hai. Matlab sab kuch agar hum logo ne backup lena hai meri ek discussion thi. Bhai jo aapki lead generate hoti hain wo actually hoti nahi. Ya hoti hain to bahut lambi lead hoti hain.
Customer: Jisko aap verify karte hain apni taraf se. Aur ye koi bhi account manager hain ya aap hain ya Preeti hain ya iske alawa koi bhi hai. Jo aapne verify lead hum logo ko provide karai, jisko aap verify bolte hain. Pehli baat to aap verify karte hi kuch nahi.
Customer: Aap log kuch bhi verify nahi karte aur hum logo ko verify karke aap dikhate hain.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Sabse pehla to mera issue ye hai ki koi bhi ho chahe wo Preeti ki koi galti nahi hai. Inki jagah koi bhi hoyega to meri pehle pehli lead yahi hai.
Customer: Agar hum logo ne uske upar backup lena hai. Matlab hum log ek customer ke saath wo customer hai ya nahi hai aur hum log uske saath regular touch mein rahenge.
Customer: To hum logo ko business milega. Wo theek hai madam fir hum log to karte rahenge. Matlab hum log ek manager aur rakh lenge apne upar jo ye kaam karega. Ab hum log to madam ye kaam kar nahi sakte. Bhai hum log apna business karenge kya hum log ek lead ke upar usse 100 bari backup lenge.
Customer: To ye hamare ko nahi samajh mein aaya madam. Ab unki taraf se apna unka samjhana jo bhi hai wo theek hai. Par main aap unke senior hain. Aap mere ko batao madam ki jisko aap verify lead kehte hain kya matlab hai us verification ka?
Executive: Theek hai. Main wahi aapse puchna chah rahi thi ki matlab main aapko dikkat kya hai jaise buyleads wagera aap consume kar rahe ho to usse aapka mainly conversion ka issue aa raha hai. Matlab jo maine aapki baaton se ab kiya ki matlab aapko conversion ka dikkat aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi madam conversion conversion ka koi conversion ka issue nahi hai. Mera ye kehna hai ki aap jisko verify lead kehte hain wo actually verify hai hi nahi. Mera to aapko question ye hai.
Executive: Dekhiye main aapko wahi cheez bata rahi hu ki yaha pe na actually sorry to interrupt you. Actually kya hota hai ki aap jo buylead jaise aap abhi jaise buylead aap consume karte ho main to sabse pehle aapko ye prefer karungi ki aap kabhi bhi koi bhi buylead consume kariye usme aap GST verified aur membership aap dekh ke kariye. Kyunki IndiaMART ke level par sir dekho 8 saal purane bhi client hai 6 saal purane bhi client hai aur aapko bhi pata hai ki aap agar IndiaMART pe ek baar agar aapne apni company register kara li aur ek baar humne aapka GST wagera sara verify karke humne register kar diya to hum har saal aapko jab jab aap renewal karaenge hum tab tak aapka verification nahi karte hain. Right? To ek bari IndiaMART ji agar kisi client ko verify kar leta hai to baar baar uska verification nahi karta hai sir. Aur already agar main new client mein agar aap bologe to new client mein ek baar ko maan sakti hu ki ho sakta hai wo ki wo verified.
Customer: Madam ye ek ek ek aadmi ne lekin inquiry daal di. Aur hum log bhi hum logo ke saath bhi aisa hi hai. Hum log koi cheez Google pe search karte hain.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Koi cheez Google pe search na hoke wo seedha ka seedha IndiaMART pe jaati hai. IndiaMART usko verify matlab inquiry bana deta hai hamari lead ko humne Google pe kuch cheez search karni chahiye.
Customer: Jabki wo Google pe humne to general product search kara hai Google pe ya hum logo curiosity hai hum log jo jaanna chah rahe hain us product ke bare mein humne sirf itna search kara. Ab us search ko aapne trade lead mein badal diya aur sellers ko dikha diya ab ye trade lead hai. To wo trade lead hui kaise pehli baat to ye bata samjhao mere ko aap.
Executive: Main aapko is cheez ka batati hu sir. Aap agar ye cheez pehle mujhe bolte na to definitely main ye cheez maan leti ki hota tha sir aisa ki IndiaMART pe koi bhi agar requirement aake search karta tha to wo bhi ek requirement banke post ho jaati thi aap logo ke catalog pe. Theek hai? Ye cheez main pehle maanti. Lekin na February month se hi February 2024 se hi ye cheez bhi hamara already change ho chuka hai. Ab IndiaMART ek buylead ko tab tak post nahi karta hai jab tak buyer hume Google ke through bhi proper proper hume details nahi deta hai. Aap waha pe dekhenge proper specification jab tak nahi rehta hai wo buylead aapka hum post nahi karte. Waha pe sara detail aapka dala rehta hai ki quantity kya hai, capacity kya hai, order value kya hai, requirement kis cheez ke liye hai. Right?
Customer: Achha bina bina order value ek second madam. Bina order value ki aap lead dalte hain?
Executive: Sir aapko bahut kam buylead milegi bina order value ke.
Customer: Fir madam agar agar kam mili aap ek baat batao. Abhi aapne kaha ki hum log jab tak ye sab data hamare paas nahi aata tab tak hum log buylead nahi banate. Abhi aapne bola na word.
Executive: Main wahi wahi cheez main aapko bata rahi hu sir ki wo already humne improve kiya hai ab aap is cheez ko samjho ki ek hi baar mein ye sari cheeze dekho IndiaMART bahut chhoti company nahi hai sir ki ek hi baar humne wo aage complaint kari aur wo turant remove turant wo cheez remove ho gayi ya fir turant wo cheez update ho gaya. Right? Proper discussion hota hai fir us pe kaam hota hai agar aapki tarah aur bahut sare cliento ne is cheez se related complaint ki jaise main bata du catalog view ka option aapka band ho chuka tha right? Lekin bahut sare catalog mein cliento ne us cheez se related hume concern raise kiya ki ha bhai catalog view unke kaam ka hota tha to wo IndiaMART ne relaunch kar diya aapka catalog view ka option. Right? So hum is tarike se hi kaam karte hain ab koi bhi cheeze dheere dheere hi improve hoti hai.
Customer: Madam ab ab ab ab madam maine maine ye ek whatsapp ka option hai aapke system ke upar. Ye kyu likha hai madam aapne whatsapp uske upar word ke upar kyu likha hai aapni profile ke upar whatsapp?
Executive: Sir whatsapp ka icon aapko waha par isliye banaya gaya hai ki aap agar kabhi bhi hamare paas na dekho ek whatsapp ka feature bhi aata hai sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Waha pe aap dekhoge whatsapp communication pe na already aapko waha pe notification un logo ne on karke diya hua hai ki kabhi bhi agar aapko whatsapp ke through bhi client ko connect karna hua ki aapko client ko whatsapp ke through connect kar sakte ho ya nahi kar sakte ho. To wo aap easily whatsapp ke through bhi kar sakte ho right? Lekin uske liye kehne ka waha pe dikhane ka uska ye matlab hai ki whatsapp ka ek alag se feature aata hai sir hamare paas I am Insta ka. Theek hai wo aap loge na to ye jo whatsapp ka icon hum aapko yaha pe dikha rahe hain ki whatsapp ka notification aap on kar sakte ho wo aapko icon na aapke direct catalog par ek whatsapp ka icon visible karke dikhata hai I am Insta mein. Aur I am uske whatsapp ke ha ji I am Insta ke fir paise alag denge aapko?
Executive: Haan bilkul. Whatsapp I am Insta ke bhi aapke charges lagte hain.
Customer: Haan main wahi keh raha hu na madam. Aap matlab ek jo hai na jab hum log ye aap hamare se subscription lete hain tab aap hamare se bahut tarah ki baatein karte hain. Uske baad jab subscription le lete hain tab aap kehte hain bhi aap jaise to 100 log hain is profile ke upar dhandha to aapne hi karna hai. Bhai hum logo ne to aapko ek paid member bana diya dhandha to aapne hi karna hai bhi aap jaise to bahut logo ne membership le rakhi hai. Jab aap membership dete hain to aapke mouth word jo hai na kuch aur hote hain. Jab kisi ne membership le li fir aapka ek second madam matlab uske uske baad madam ek hi baat rehti hai jab bhi aapke koi koi bhi customer sales hain ya jo bhi hain bhi aap isko upgrade karao to aap dikhenge agar aap isko upgrade nahi karte to jitni visibility pe aapko kaam karna padega. Fir pehle hum log ek membership lenge fir hum log fir sochenge bhi pehle aaj humne aaj ₹20000 de diye kal ko hum soche bhi ₹10000 aur de do kya fark padta hai. Fir soche bhi hum ₹10000 aur de do sir kya fark padta hai. Matlab sara ka sara jo hai na focus madam agar IndiaMART ka isi cheez pe rahega to kabhi na kabhi IndiaMART jo hai na ye fail ho jayega. Chalo India bahut bada hai fail kya hoyega aapko agar higher services ke liye suggest kiya gaya hai to main mana kar dungi apni team ko. Madam hamesha hamesha hamesha madam main keh raha hu hamesha ye single time nahi hai hamesha jab bhi unka koi kisi ka bhi aapka customer ka aaj unhone mere ko video call pe mere ko kya cheez dikhana chah rahe the unhone kya service mere ko avail karai. Matlab mere ko unhone kya cheez dikhaya. Bhi unhone ye dikhaya bhi dusre jo aapse higher hain higher jisko hum log pay kar rahe hain ya jisne higher service le rakhi hai unki visibility jyada hai aapki visibility zero hai. Aap uski visibility aapne increase karne ke liye aapne speed catalog pe kya kaam kara aur aapne kaise meri visibility badhai. Ye aap log karenge agar mere ko samajh hoti to main aapse kis liye matha marta. To aap agar ye baat matlab agar agar dekho madam dekho madam waise waise dekho chalo madam pata kya hai. Mere ko na to IndiaMART se koi fark padta aur koi kaam aaye ya na aaye mere ko usse bhi fark nahi padta par jo ye aap logo ne koi bhi kisi bhi nayi pattern bana rakha hai na bhai ek call karna aur call karke ek hi baat pe apna dhyan rakhna bhi ye customer isse jyada paise hum logo ko kaise de. Promotion hoti hai ya kisi ki promotion hoti hai mere ko nahi pata aapki team ya koi bhi banda catalog ke upar kya kaam karta hai. Madam ne ya Preeti madam se kitne time se mera catalog hai inhone mere ko kya mere ko kya suggest kara bhi ye aap isko main aapki catalog pe kya kaam kar rahi hu jisse visibility badhegi. Agar sab kuch mere ko karna hai to fir ye kya karenge. To kis liye aap sir dekhiye yaha pe na dekhiye main aapko bata deti hu main aapka point sara samajh rahi hu main higher services ke liye mana kar dungi ki sir ko abhi nahi chahiye. Hum aapki sirf servicing pe kaam karna start karenge. Aap madam aap service dekho aap mere catalog ko aap revise karenge aap isko isme ye itne hi paiso mein kaise chamke ye aapka hai mera nahi hai. aapki baat sahi hai sir aapki baat sahi hai ye aap dekhna hai agar aap dekhunga aur aapko aapko bhi main dekhunga. Hmm. Main aapko wahi cheez samjhane aapne feedback nahi nahi main wahi keh raha hu na agar aapne bhi feedback aapka feedback call aaya IndiaMART ka to main kar lunga aapke liye bhi. Sir main kam to aap isko refresh karenge na ki main iske upar mehnat karunga agar maine mehnat karni hoti to main khud dekhunga aapse mehnat karta nahi aur na mere ko koi India na ye koi manager samajh nahi kare na kare kam karo nahi to na karo. Mere ko nahi manager ki. Mere ko to sirf ek baat kehna hai madam agar koi kaam karega to proper kare nahi karna chahte to mere se na puche wo main kya karu wo mere ko suggestion de bhi main aise kar raha hu. Meri baat to sun lijiye meri baat to sun lijiye main tab se aapki baatein sun rahi hu aur meri baat bhi suniye aapki jo point hai aap apni baat sahi keh rahe hain main aapko mana nahi kar rahi hu lekin mere ko jo yaha pe lag raha hai ki agar aapne aapko unhone koi cheez suggest kari hai higher services ke liye to main us cheez ke liye mana kar de rahi hu ki sir ko higher services mein nahi jaana hai right? To uske related agar aapko aaj unhone aaj unhone koi koi higher aaj unhone koi higher services ke liye suggestion nahi kara na unhone bola. Aap mere ko ye mat dikhaiye. Dusri cheez main aapko bata deti hu dusri cheez main aapko bata deti hu ek minute ruk jaiye sir ek minute rukiye main kya bol rahi hu. Dusri cheez main aapko ye bata rahi hu ki rahi baat aapke call aur feedback se related jo aapko issues ho rahe hain ki jo karna hai hume hi karna hai nahi to agar aapko karna hai aapko feedback dena hai to koi matlab nahi hai fir account manager ka right? To main aapko bata du sir dekhiye yaha par har employee kaam kar raha hai IndiaMART ke liye right? IndiaMART mein unko wo kaam de rakha hai ki aapko client mein client se month mein agar aap do baar nahi to ek bari aapko client se call loge ki services kaisi chal rahi hain usme koi dikkat to nahi hai kyunki yaha par hum sirf aapke catalog ko improve kar sakte hain to already Preeti ne kaafi achha kar rakha hai aapke catalog ka quality score 77% kar rakha hai unhone theek hai har aapki product ki mapping sahi kar rakhi hai unhone to already jo aapka basic catalog hota hai wo aapka achha madam ek baar ek baar check karo madam inhone Preeti ji ne kab mere catalog pe haath lagaya aur kab inhone isko improve kara aap isko check karke mere ko phone karo madam aapne 77% kar rakhi hai kab isko improvement kari hai madam? Sir main wahi bata rahi hu ki minimum hume jo chahiye hota hai na 80% chahiye hota hai aapka catalog ka quality score theek hai 77% Preeti ne already kar rakha hai rahi baat wo pucho madam unhone unhone unhone kab kab kara madam kab kara kab kara madam kab kara Sir ye already unhone kaafi time pehle kar rakha hai. Unhone kuch nahi kara madam. Nahi kara ye maine kara hai. Sir theek hai aapne catalog ka quality score sahi kara hoga lekin mapping to aap sahi nahi kar sakte na sir. Mapping hamare site se hi sahi hoti hai ki aapki kaunsi product aap batao madam aap batao madam kitne saal pehle kari hai aapne fir? Right? To wahi bata rahi hu rahi baat jo remaining aapke 5-7% ki jo hume badhana hai jo mujhe lag raha hai ki aapka badhana chahiye wo main aur Preeti ko bolke sahi karwa deti hu ki wo aapka aur 85% tak aapka catalog ka quality score badha de aur jaise hi catalog quality score wo 85% aapka kar dengi wo aapko ek bari screenshot aapke catalog ka de degi sir 77.3% tha maine 85% kar diya hai ab aap apne site se ek baar dekh lijiye ki isme aur kya improvement karna hai kyunki client ke according bhi improvement jaruri hai theek hai baki yaha par jo aapne not satisfied diya tha wo actually kya hota hai sir wo service feedback ke liye nahi hota hai jispe bhi aap baat karte ho na jaise aapne abhi mere se baat kari ya fir Preeti se isse pehle aapne baat kari thi right? To wo unke feedback ke liye hota hai ki jo bhi unhone solution aapko diya hai IndiaMART se related wo zero wo zero zero hai madam zero hai. To aap mujhe bataiye na sir ki abhi fir aap kaise satisfied honge kyunki mere according main abhi koi main madam nahi madam main aapki baat se bhi satisfied nahi hu zero mein ji aapki baat se bhi agar aapki baat se feedback aayega to aapke upar bhi dunga mere ko koi phone karne se pehle agar koi bhi phone karega to phone ko band kare madam mike mat kare phone. To sir ye agar phone karke aap aise suggestion denge na to ye suggestion zero hai madam main agree nahi hu. Aap kya chahte hain sir nahi aap kya chahte hain fir bataiye jo aapki problem thi wo maine aapko resolve karane ke liye wo maine solution bata diya ki sir main ye ye aapke catalog mein karwa dungi right? Matlab mere ko koi phone na kare madam mera to yahi solution hai madam agar aap mere ko phone karenge to fir aapko koi call nahi chahiye aapko koi call nahi chahiye IndiaMART ki taraf se theek hai theek hai to abhi abhi main ye nahi chahiye madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer questions the value of verified leads.

- Doubts the lead verification process.

- Expresses concern about the video call.

- Questions the need for higher services.

- Feels IndiaMART focuses on upselling instead of service.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the lead verification process.

- Executive offered to improve catalog quality score.

- Executive will deny higher services to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will have Preeti improve catalog score.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, verification
